website_summaries.verdict: This highly portable sprayer works well with thick paints and reduces overspray.
pros: Has new features that reduce overspray
Siphons directly from a can or bucket

customer_reviews.title: This is one awesome sprayer. So happy with the purchase I made ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome sprayer. So happy with the purchase I made a video. For the price, you can't beat this machine. It makes any large paint job you have a snap.
customer_reviews.author: G. Notel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool for Staining Large Deck/Fence
customer_reviews.text: I own two other Titan sprayers but neither were really appropriate for spraying stain. This extremely affordable tool is the perfect solution. Easy to use and very easy to clean. Like other reviews, I agree it would be nice if it had a longer hose. Oh. And while there is a tip included, you'll want to order the 311 if you plan to spray stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Limited warranty means that the actual pump motor is not covered! most important part not covered!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor customer service. Product made by Wagner and is described to have 2 yr limited warranty. What you find out is that the actual pump motor is not even covered. After just 8 gallons of paint was sprayed the pump began to leak. Wagner states that this is overuse, the description of this sprayer was 300gallon per year use rating.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what we wanted it to!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to paint our huge fence in the back yard. Took 3 days of spraying and cutting, and over 100 gal of stain but we finished and couldn’t be more pleased with the results. The Behr semi transparent stain went on smoothly and covered well being sprayed by this sprayer with the nozzle included in the package. I made sure I cleaned it per the instructions so I will be able to use it on my pergola later in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mullis

customer_reviews.title: junk!  due to proprietary gun and hose
customer_reviews.text: problem is gun is proprietary so i can't use a whip on it, fittings on hose and gun r not standard, and it's hard to maneuver, cheap gun, decent sprayer! by now the gun cloggs (purposely comes w no filter) and has become impossible to use, hose has began to kink so i'm looking at $150 for gun kit or $72 for gun alone that could b replaced for $20 if it was not proprietary, irreplaceable fitting. stay away from it if u paint with any regularity! i'm not pouring more good $ after bad on this cheesy piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Bermann

customer_reviews.title: Runs
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it twice the first time it did good the second time it did bad it keeps stoping i would clean it and it would stop again im a painter so i know how to take care of them...i think for 427.00 dollars i spent and its only had 10 gallons thew it ...im not happy its junk...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a hand sprayer to paint a very large deck, and it was taking forever and a day, so I hired someone and purchased another hand sprayer. Unfortunately, this did not speed up the process much either, so I bought this Titan Airless sprayer, and we were able to give it two coats and still finish in record qu In record time. I love it. Can't wait to paint my she-shed with this airless wonder!
customer_reviews.author: Crstin16

customer_reviews.title: Great painting machine
customer_reviews.text: Great painting machine, just adjust paint thickness and shoot. Easy to clean, the filter in paint booth should be changed or modified, it just does not let enough paint to be sucked up and thru the hose. Other than the filter problem, this paint machine is great.
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: Whatever you estimate the quantity of paint to be..... double it.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit to do, to clean up, even with latex. It just may be the nature of the beast. The overspray was quite a bit more than I expected BUT.... hands down, The is really fast, boom, your done. Clean up takes about 20 minutes and 5-8 gallons of water. The spray job was only about 5 minutes ( fencing ).
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Good for Homeowner or Contractor who occasionally paints
customer_reviews.text: I painted a whole 2200 sf interior with this. Its ok. Def not like a pro grade sprayer. It sprays latex pain, but you need to thin it with water quite a bit. If you are halfway good at spraying, this unit has a hard time keeping up with you. For the price, its good. But it is very cheap, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but be careful of what paint you are putting through it as it gets clogged up pretty easily and you have to clean it. Had to buy the Titan one that had 55% less overspray to use with it.
customer_reviews.author: paula johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying I have been a professional painter for 30 years. I am happy with the pump, when it worked. I used the machine twice, cleaned it perfectly and upon unboxing, (yes unboxing because I store it back in the box after I use it) it would not draw the paint through the inlet, not even water would draw. I did buy a 4 year warranty so we shall see what happens. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sprayer after researching the various Graco and Titan models. I felt that this model was the best compromise between price and durability for a homeowner (non-professional). I have been very pleased. I have followed the operating and cleaning instructions to a "t", and have had no problems. So far, I have put approx 15 gallons of primer and exterior paint through it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the sprayer hasn't even lasted 90 days and I have hardly even used it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Find the right spray tip and you’re in business
customer_reviews.text: Once I got this thing going it was so easy to stain my fence. Finding the right size tip for the product is key. Easy to clean if you do it immediately. Don’t let the spray gun nozzle sit too long and you’re fine!!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Spray-on gave me problems right away first time I used it because I waited 3 months to use it I wasn't able to return it through Amazon I wanted to return product to upgrade for about a model was not able to not very happy
customer_reviews.author: walter chickering

customer_reviews.title: Was great when new , now it doesn’t work as great !
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for 6 months now , did 3 paint jobs and the Gun is leaking paint all over the place , when spraying it leaves drop marks when stopping spraying . It worked very good when it was new but now i don’t know if it’s the gun or the sprayer pump itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and clean, add a couple more minutes and you can easily service it for long term storage. It's also great to paint with. Only problem I had was the tip would plug up , but it is easy to unplug. Overall I' glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Made fast work out of staining fence
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Titan ControlMax 1700 sprayer to put stain on a wood fence. In reading the manual I found the included tip is for interior and exterior water based paint, that a 311 tip is necessary for spraying stain. Glad I caught that. Used the sprayer and the 311 tip to stain a 4 section wood fence on both sides and it came out great. I did have to stop 3/4 of the way through the job and remove the tip, seemed like some air got in the line, after clearing the line everything ran fine. I plan on using it to paint exterior wood siding on the house.
customer_reviews.author: Doghouse Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Constantly plugs. Nozzle prices are ridiculous.
customer_reviews.text: Write up claims it will shoot thick paint. Don't believe it. Constantly plugs. No filter. Nozzle prices in the 30 and $40 range which is nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Flyinglow

customer_reviews.title: Definitely lacquer proof for a couple gallons and 6-8hour straight use!
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to spray lacquer. Something small, easy. It managed a fairly large kitchen. Totally solid performance with lacquer for about 10 hours STRAIGHT. Definitely not a daily driver without some small tubing changes but if you have a gallon or two this little machine lays out a very nice finish! (Again, lacquer!). I’d imagine you could spray oil based and urethanes all day every day!
customer_reviews.author: brett potter

customer_reviews.title: Suction hose won't straighten out
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression I could use this to paint my room. Setup took about 20 minutes. I wasn't really able to spray much because I couldn't get the Suction hose to stay in the paint bucket. Unless you're spraying 3 gallons or more I'd suggest another sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Al Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sprayer My son used it to paint my bedroom in a short amount of time. Not alot of overspray or waste.
customer_reviews.author: Constance S Klagge

customer_reviews.title: Warranty time for titan too long and covers nothing
customer_reviews.text: It was good until after the 3rd use and it was not good. Called titan told me to take it to a service center and 3.5 weeks later still waiting for a answer will not buy it again. After dealing with titan they denied warranty the unit was totally damaged and will cost more than 1/2 to make work again stay away from this unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use for a small proyect and runs good! It is the second time I bought the same paint spryer machine the first one I gave to my son as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Julio Cesar Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to use a lot more paint that if you use a roller. A lot more prep time too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I tested it out and it was working fine. I write another review in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Good airless sprayer, good pattern.
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to get it primed, but be patient. Will blast through 15 gallons of paint in just a couple of hours. Very little overspray.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stiegman

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter sprayer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a paint sprayer if any kind not am I mechanically inclined. But I nailed the use of this sprayer in my first use. Watch the videos. It’s so easy. One caveat, the tips are not universal so replacement may be more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: noell

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to paint a new house I am building, ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to paint a new house I am building, didn't get to finish the painting of the ceiling white before it broke less than 25 Gallons.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sprayer. Easy to setup, use and clean. Sprays in thinned paint straight from the can with ease. Nice even spray pattern with no runs. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A small sprayer but a beast on the job. Titan rules!
customer_reviews.author: Ras Michael

customer_reviews.title: hose no good
customer_reviews.text: Hose sprung a leak second time I used very unhappy with hose not pro would never take inside a house replaced hose. Sprays nice hose is junk.
customer_reviews.author: aloha

customer_reviews.title: Quality Application of exterior SW paint.
customer_reviews.text: My wife who had never used a sprayer, did the exterior of a new 24 by 24 foot barn quickly with no issues. Would be 5 star but cleanup is a little more than expected. Need to allow 45 minutes to do a full job after a job.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I just used 3 times and then it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Does not have power to even paint a 10' piece ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not have power to even paint a 10' piece of metal. What country makes these motors? Very low power and does not even need to be advertised as a PRO model.
customer_reviews.author: juicer in ky

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a replacement to an older graco sprayer and very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Bought Crap

customer_reviews.title: Bad sprayer nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer nozzle leaks badly. I have not been able to use sprayer yet due to this problem.
customer_reviews.author: dyna

customer_reviews.title: dosent work even close to what the stats said
customer_reviews.text: worthless garbage do buy unless you want to use it as a sprinkler
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Van Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Big boys tool
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it is well made, will let you know how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: weebee9

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. HOPE WILL DO THE REAL JOB. LET SEE.
customer_reviews.text: Even when I test the equipment with water it work ok. Fill low preasure.
customer_reviews.author: ismael latorre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The young man that delivered this item and another item was fantastic. It was a miserable rainy night, but he was very polite, cheerful and very professional. Wish more people were like him. Can't wait to use my sprayer!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Everything was ok I’m done with it and returning it since my wife made the transaction without approval
customer_reviews.author: Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get through 6 gallons before the pump quit working
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Shocked you when touched. The company sent someone to pick up. Waiting on another one. Will give this one more try.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella Lands

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This paint sprayer helped us to paint the interior of our house much faster than using only rollers or brushes. Set up is easy but it does take a good amount of effort to clean it up properly. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Call

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: so easy to use. VERY little overspray. easy cleanup too. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little profesional sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little profesional sprayer. Easier to control and gives you a smaller overspray. It works well with latex paint. It gives a beautiful finish specially when i'm using the tip 311 and 412 low pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Dawid Karcz

customer_reviews.title: leaks like a siv
customer_reviews.text: I painted my parents house, worked great. went to use it the second time to stain a deck and had to put a paint pan under it to catch the stain. it leaked like a siv. pretty disappointing to spend 300.00 bucks to paint a house...
customer_reviews.author: Who knows

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly wasteful. The hoses can't be sprayed without more paint in the bucket so you are wasting a qt. Per spray session.
customer_reviews.author: Alan W.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lightweight and low pressure
customer_reviews.text: Low pressure sprayer. At full pressure I continued to have tails with this sprayer. I was using paint that should have worked fine. Feels very lightweight and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: zeroty475

customer_reviews.title: And it works perfect will definitely get another one with this one does ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this machine strictly for oilbase,Been running it for a year straight. And it works perfect will definitely get another one with this one does go but there are no signs of it anytime soon
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: I like this unit it beats rolling any day I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit it beats rolling any day I am just a home owner and had a few larger projects this summer it works like it should. I never used a sprayer before so I don't know what I should expect . I push the button and my wood gets painted . cleaning is the hardest part . a instructional video would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: A new standard for top end homeowner airless sprayers
customer_reviews.text: 13 gallons so far. Easy to set up, use and clean. Simple, lightweight, well thought out design. Everything I had hoped for in an airless. When it is running it sounds like someone pulling on a lawn mower starter rope trying to start a non working mower. Titan lost the first unit because they installed the label on the flimsy shrink wrap that was on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Duceman

customer_reviews.title: one of the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this machine. It took so much work out of painting my house. Awesome, just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John Berry

customer_reviews.title: Work for real
customer_reviews.text: Only work 1 time, then for guaranty the Wagner send me other and this work 3 times and that it
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: the machine is not working good, i have to end up using a paint ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't get no satisfaction a tall, the machine is not working good, i have to end up using a paint brush to do the job. It just not spraying good, i feel i waste my money to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: cleve cochrane

customer_reviews.title: WoWoWo...needed the 50' not a 30' HOSS
customer_reviews.text: In the same boat as the previous reviewer, not very happy as the extended 50' hose length was a feature I really wanted. I haven been able to use it yet but when I purchased it last month the website stated it was 50 foot. I may end up simply returning it...
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: clogs to easy, not easy to get replacement tips
customer_reviews.text: No screen, clogs to easy, not easy to get replacement tips. A lot of over spray. Been spraying professionally for over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Parsons

product_meta.title: Titan ControlMax 1700 Pro 580006 w/ Cart High Efficiency Airless Paint Sprayer, HEA technology decreases overspray by up to 55% while delivering softer spray
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Control Max 1700 w/cartThe Titan ControlMax 1700 Pro High Efficiency Airless sprayer provides serious DIYers and handymen high output with more control and less mess. It can be used on interior and exterior jobs with unthinned paints and stains on walls, ceilings, and exterior finishes. The High Efficiency Airless (HEA) system decreases overspray by up to 55% while delivering a softer spray ensuring a consistent finish every time. The ControlMax sprays up to .33 gallon per minute through the 515 spray tip (ideal for latex paint) and has adjustable pressure from the .60 horsepower motor. Different HEA sized tips are sold separately to match your coating and project needs. The sprayer pulls paint directly from your 1 or 5 gallon paint container for added convenience, plus when you’re done painting you can store your tips and tools in the integrated storage. The paint sprayer also features a fully portable cart design by having wheels and a 50 ft. hose so you can easily complete large projects. The durable and powerful sprayer is backed by the industry’s best and longest 2 warranty. For a model with more power and different features, check out the Titan ControlMax 1900 Pro sprayer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Titan ControlMax 1700 Pro high efficiency airless takes the fear out of airless spraying, making it easier to paint like a pro. The HEA system’s new tip technology decreases over spray by up to 55% while delivering softer spray, improving control and providing a more consistent finish. The .60 horsepower HEA pump is a durable and powerful sprayer that can spray unthinned coatings with a rebuildable fluid section that maximizes sprayer life and it is backed by the industry best and longest warranty. The ControlMax 1700 Pro has a flow rate of .33 GPM and can accomodate up to a .017 inch tip. The unit comes with a 515 ControlMax tip and tip guard and a 50 foot hose.
feature_bullets: AIRLESS PAINT SPRAYER: The ControlMax 1700 Pro is designed for serious DIYers and handymen, making it easier to paint like a pro. Perfect for painting big projects like home exteriors, fences, decks, garages and more

HIGH EFFICIENCY AIRLESS TECHNOLOGY: This paint sprayer features HEA technology that decreases overspray by up to 55% while delivering softer spray, improving control and providing a more-consistent finish

HOW IS IT DIFFERENT? This ControlMax sprayer has a max operating pressure of 1500 PSI, can spray up to 300 gallons per year, features an all-metal gun, and utilizes a 50 ft. hose (can be extended up to 100 ft. for longer reach)
VARIABLE SPEED PUMP: Has a 0.60 horsepower pump that can spray unthinned paints and stains up to 0.33 gallons per minute, ensuring great productivity
FULLY PORTABLE CART DESIGN: Designed for maximum portability by having wheels and a 50 ft. hose so you can easily move around large projects and reach tall areas while on a ladder

specifications.Included Components: ControlMax Sprayer, 50 ft Hose, ControlMax Gun and ControlMax 515 Tip
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
